title: Zombie Slayer stickers are here... FOR YOUR BRAINS!!!!
body:
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} Uuuuunnnngg! We're so hungry and there's nothing good to eat anywhere.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} Awww! Poor weird zombie monster thing. Here take this delicious weirdly-shaped cake I just baked!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} Yeah, enjoy that totally not explosive “cake.”
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} Wow! This looks great. Thanks insane pink hair lady and chainsaw guy!
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} You know that’s just a stick of dynamite covered in frosting, right? Do not eat tha….

*BOOOOM!!!!!*

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} Nice, ya brain-dead dummy.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} Jinx! You lied to us! How could you be so cruel?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} Oops! My bad. Here have another cake as an apology! 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} Oh yum!!!
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} ARE YOU KIDDING ME?!

---

Check out the widget below (the one with Jinx's face)  and start raising  the dead with the Zombie Slayer sticker pack now!

replies.body: FYI we embiggened the stickers :D {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I never need to use my words ever again. Farewell words.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

You aren't showing a title. What's your job? Thx for the stickers, love em! Do you think we could get the Facebook stickers or more in the future?
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
The Facebook stickers are exclusive to Facebook so they will not be coming here, but if you guys really enjoy these stickers we can certainly look into making more in the future.

Don't be silly, of course we will enjoy them! I figured the FB stickers might be exclusive. It's a shame; I'll just have to keep getting them from the [gamespot](http://www.gamespot.com/articles/league-of-legends-now-has-facebook-stickers/1100-6430852/) article :3

http://static2.gamespot.com/uploads/scale_super/1551/15516851/2941773-lfs22.png

i didnt know that worked

http://static3.gamespot.com/uploads/square_avatar/1551/15516851/2941762-lfs11.png

QUICK MAKE A BAD PUN THREAD! 

Give me an excuse to use my new stickers =3

HOLD UP! I'M NOT GOOD UNDER PRESSURE!
http://static4.gamespot.com/uploads/original/1551/15516851/2941765-lfs14.png
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/ZXBBuxuJ-if-urgots-q-procced-sheen
How did you get a Vi sticker? I dont see that in the sticker gallery.

[Those are the Facebook stickers, and you can find them here.](http://www.gamespot.com/articles/league-of-legends-now-has-facebook-stickers/1100-6430852/)

Just right click the one you want, copy image URL, and paste it here.

http://static2.gamespot.com/uploads/scale_super/1551/15516851/2941762-lfs11.png
^Attempt^


Success!
Do they have a Wukong one? I would love that very much {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Nope, all the stickers can be found here; http://www.gamespot.com/articles/league-of-legends-now-has-facebook-stickers/1100-6430852/

No Wu.

http://static5.gamespot.com/uploads/original/1551/15516851/2941776-lfs25.png

does imgur work too?
imgur:

gamespot:

> [{quoted}](name=hi geoffrey,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mPLGTgfQ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-11-05T22:35:09.048+0000)
>
> The Facebook stickers are exclusive to Facebook so they will not be coming here, but if you guys really enjoy these stickers we can certainly look into making more in the future.

Not to be mean, but you do know that Riot is going to get a 'very' nasty response when the halloween stickers go away and nothing replaces them, right?

I mean, you're not keeping the stickers all  year long, right?

I'm just saying, I think everyone loves the stickers, but because of that there's going to be a lot of headaches when the event ends.
I am not aware of any plans to remove the stickers.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 
http://static5.gamespot.com/uploads/original/1551/15516851/2941771-lfs20.png

> [{quoted}](name=hi geoffrey,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mPLGTgfQ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-11-05T22:35:09.048+0000)
>
> The Facebook stickers are exclusive to Facebook so they will not be coming here, but if you guys really enjoy these stickers we can certainly look into making more in the future.

Oh my of course we are loving them already and I hope you guys do make more in the future, especially ones of Jinx she looks so adorable. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
They need arcade ones

I enjoy that Idea, and what happen to not using words anymore?

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=hi geoffrey,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=mPLGTgfQ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-11-05T22:35:09.048+0000)
>
> The Facebook stickers are exclusive to Facebook so they will not be coming here, but if you guys really enjoy these stickers we can certainly look into making more in the future.

You think we could get these on facebook though? Particularly the Jinx stickers...
Title fixed, it's a very important role.
ROFL!
Can we get the Facebook stickers as well?

Now I have the perfect emotes for bad puns.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} 

le rarest!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

@A RANDOM RIOTER!

Is the first image containing Zombie Nunu a reference to sad Pepe? IS THIS A DANK MEME I DETECT?!?

I'm like a zombie, but instead of hunting flesh I hunt dank memes.

I am a zommeme.
only the dankest4u~

When someone makes fun of my Main:
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I like your name

Oh my gosh! Jinx looks sooooo cute! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Are they going to be on Facebook? Pretty please?  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

So anime, I like it.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
May I ask if they will ever come to Facebook?
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} #RARE
can we have them for face book chat????

This is beautiful.  Let us keep these please.  This is a whole nother expression of nonverbal communication online and it is beautiful!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
OMG this is so awesome, thanks for making these stickers guys they look amazing.
why dont u add all the leauge stickers into every chat box in the boards and even the non zombie stickers
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}  aliens
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} tfw when you're dealing twice as much damage as anyone else in the game and yet the enemy team still refuses to buy MR
I hope they would come up as Facebook stickers too.

Halloween event be like
